faqs.q: How many calories in a plain bagel with cream cheese?
faqs.a: A plain bagel with 1 oz cream cheese is about 350 kcal; cheese topping adds ~100 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cheese bagel with cream cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 55 g carbs, mostly from the bagel, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a cheese bagel with cream cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 850 mg sodium due to the cheeses and bagel seasoning.

faqs.q: How much protein does it have?
faqs.a: About 16 g protein, from the bagel dough and cheese.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in a cheese bagel with cream cheese?
faqs.a: Opt for half the cream cheese or a smaller bagel to cut ~100-150 kcal.
